PageWidgetPortable.Title: Aglutinados em aberto
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_FN_FECHAMENTOSCONVENIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.STATUS = 3 AND A.DOCUMENTOGERADO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FN_DOCUMENTOS WHERE HANDLE = A.DOCUMENTOGERADO AND (VALORESBAIXADOS IS NULL OR VALORESBAIXADOS < VALORLIQUIDO)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2065_at2512_hs5af08d1.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
